channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report X-2024030718
item.description:
Report X-2024030718

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered in the unload area. Package was placed in a lined hazmat bag and placed inside of a tote. Package was brought to the QA area further investigation. DescribePack: Upon further investigation, it was discovered that one of the tops on the container was loose and leaked inside and outside of the package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Damage hazmat was placed inside of a hazmat bag and placed inside of a tote

item.title: Report X-2024030975
item.description:
Report X-2024030975

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: DURHAM
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver had taken the package out of the truck and the package was visibly wet, package handler had placed the wet package in the truck. After making sure there was no damages or injuries the packaged was opened and it was discovered that one of the items had a loose cap and had leaked out. The package was placed in a no spill container and placed at the spill containment platform for hazmats so then the proper procedures can be done. DescribePack: One of the items inside had a loose cap and that had caused the liquid inside the item to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a no spill container and the cap was retightened.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found on dock with wet outer contents. Package was placed in salvage drum for further investigation. DescribePack: upon investigation, package was found to have had a leaking container due to a loose lid. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package was immediately placed into a hazmat bag, and then into a salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2024030952
item.description:
Report X-2024030952

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-16
  • City: WHITSETT
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found with internal leakage/spill. Package was moved into hazmat tote in order to contain the spill DescribePack: Inner drum of the shipment appeared to have a loose lid DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Inner container lid was secured and moved into salvage drum in upright position to mitigate further release

item.title: Report X-2024030774
item.description:
Report X-2024030774

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-11
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The door was raised on the trailer and the box was sitting on its side. The box was soaked and leaking out on the bottom of the trailer. DescribePack: When the package was found on it is side. One of the caps had popped off and the contents leaked out. Two other bottles were on the verge of spilling out as well. The pressure was mainly at the caps on the bottles. DurationRel: 600 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken out of the trailer and put in a yellow bucket. The bucket was brought around to be written up at the QA station.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE UNLOADED FORM TRAILER BOX BOTTOM OPENED BOTTLE FELL OUT BREAKING. CLEAN UP AND PACKAGE PLACED IN PLASTIC TUB MOVED TO QA STAGING LOCATION DescribePack: BOTTOM OF PACKAGE GLUE DID NOT HOLD DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: MOVED FORM QA STAGING LOCATION TO THE HAZMAT CAGE FOR PROSESSING

item.title: Report X-2024030756
item.description:
Report X-2024030756

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: GREENVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was advised of a hazmat package that was leaking inside of a delivery leaking that was being loaded. Upon inspection liquid could be seen leaking from the package and pooled on the floor of the vehicle. DescribePack: Hazmat container appeared to be loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat container was closed accordingly and placed inside of a plastic bin. Hazmat bin was then stored inside of the hazmat cage.

item.description:
Report X-2024030907

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Metal pail was dropped against sharp object causing a puncture, immediately item was place in lined tote and taken to hazmat processing cage. DescribePack: Metal pail was dropped against sharp object causing a puncture 1/2 inch wide in the center of dent. DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: Metal pail immediately placed in lined tote and taken to hazmat processing cage.

item.title: Report X-2024030876
item.description:
Report X-2024030876

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: When the package was being unloaded. The tape must have come off. The jug fell out and a made contact with something sharp the cut the jug on the side. DescribePack: A large cut down the side of the jug was made and the liquid inside leaked out . DurationRel: 800 and MitigateEffect: The jug was put back in the box it came in. It was then put in a Haz Mat plastic bag and yellow tub to keep it from spilling anymore.
